page.title: 05Entertainment
page.content: In the area there is quite a lot to do for entertainment.The main place is the Cliffs Pavilion where all kinds of shows and concerts go on. There are no cinemas in the area, but some films are shown at the Pavilion. {Cliffs Pavilion It stands at the top of the Cliffs opposite the Beecroft Art Gallery. It was opened in July 1964. The Cliffs Pavilion can hold 1160 people for a show. It can also be hired for shows, exhibitions and displays. Also there are coffee, afternoon teas,dinner dances and lots more. It is a centre for family entertainment. The Cliffs Pavilion stands in the lovely Westcliff Gardens and it overlooks the Estuary. The catering is run by a private company. Written by Angela Diep (9yrs)
